content.rendered:
Road Transport

Breakbulk

Breakbulk Logistics Services in Singapore
  1. Home

What is Breakbulk Shipping?

Breakbulk is a specialized shipping method ideal for transporting goods that don’t conform to standard container dimensions due to their size, shape, or weight. This method is particularly useful for companies needing to move heavy machinery, oversized cargo, or specialized equipment in its entirety. Unlike containerized shipping, breakbulk allows these items to be shipped without dismantling, preserving the integrity of the equipment and ensuring safe and secure delivery.

What We Offer

Breakbulk

TrueLog offers comprehensive breakbulk services tailored to client specifications, including:

Police Escorts

TrueLog ensures the safety and security of your high-value and sensitive cargo with professional police escort services, providing seamless transportation even through high-risk areas.

Low Bed Trucking

Our low bed trucking services are designed to handle oversized and heavy loads, offering a reliable solution for transporting large machinery, equipment, and other bulky items.

Night Deliveries

TrueLog’s night delivery service minimizes disruptions and ensures timely arrival, allowing your cargo to move efficiently and reach its destination when roads are less congested.

Choking and Lashing

Our expert team provides precise choking and lashing services, securing your cargo effectively to prevent any movement or damage during transit, ensuring it arrives safely.

Out-of-Gauge Transportation

TrueLog specializes in out-of-gauge transportation, expertly handling cargo that exceeds standard dimensions, offering customized solutions to meet your unique logistics needs.

Why Trust TrueLog with Your Breakbulk Shipping Needs?

Breakbulk shipping offers a versatile and reliable solution for transporting irregularly shaped or oversized cargo that can’t be accommodated by standard shipping containers. It ensures the safety and integrity of valuable machinery and equipment by allowing them to be shipped whole, without the need for disassembly.

Versatility

Breakbulk shipping is perfect for irregularly shaped or oversized cargo that cannot fit into traditional shipping containers. This includes heavy machinery, industrial equipment, construction materials, and other large items

Safety and Integrity

Our internal quality program is uniquely tailored to our operations, allowing us to consistently monitor and improve the quality of our services and technology solutions. Regular assessments and stringent benchmarks help us meet and exceed client expectations

Reliable and Timely Delivery

At TrueLog, we understand the importance of timely delivery. Our team works diligently to ensure that your cargo reaches its destination on schedule.

Custom Solutions

Every shipment is unique. Breakbulk shipping allows for tailored solutions, where the handling, loading, and unloading processes are customized to the specific needs of your cargo

Expertise

With years of experience in the logistics industry, TrueLog has the knowledge and expertise to handle even the most challenging breakbulk shipments.

Connect with Our Experts Today!

Schedule a call, book a meeting, or reach out with your questions—we’re here to help.
Get a Free Consultation
